titles.title: To reduce temporarily the rate of duty on frames and mountings for spectacles, goggles, or the like, the foregoing of plastics.
To reduce temporarily the rate of duty on frames and mountings for spectacles, goggles, or the like, the foregoing of plastics.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily reduce the rate of duty on frames and mountings for spectacles, goggles, or the like, the foregoing of plastics.
